title: My 3rd Pixel that can not use a headset, either direct USB-C (Google) or w a converter. Anyone else?
content:
Every Pixel I've owned has a USB-C that fails. It starts out just fine, then eventually fails. I tried all 3 of my wired headsets and earbuds. None work now, and they did when this replacement phone first showed up.

I can't use bluetooth, so I must have this option for work!

I'm told it happens to all Pixels .. that their USB-C ports are defective. Anyone else?
